title: BRIEF-Wonders Information's shares to halt trading pending asset acquisition
text:
BRIEF-Wonders Information's shares to halt trading pending asset acquisition Sept 29 
Sept 29 Wonders Information Co Ltd 
* Says its shares to halt trading from sept 30 pending asset acquisition plan 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1MDvqnp 
Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
